title: TD Senna Splash-art detail
body:
I'm wondering what's on the pice of paper that Senna dropped below. 
[Left-Down Corner](https://cdn.polscygracze.pl/uploads/2019/10/Senna.jpg?_ga=2.29724792.695683587.1581614841-1717531046.1581614839)
Thresh's Lamp sign and "THRESH RE..."
Does he connected to this skin universe?
Riot explain!!!

replies.body: Thresh does not, but it does say REC and is in the form of a contract, so it's likely her just burning a contract with "Thresh Records."
This person knows too much. Thresh will be coming soon to a lantern near you.

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=zlFxNNj3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2020-02-14T18:41:14.227+0000)
>
> This person knows too much. Thresh will be coming soon to a lantern near you.

https://imgur.com/sycHceG.png[img]
Bring it!
Why did True Damage Senna Prestige not get a boarder equivalent to the other TD boarders? Like with the "play - pause etc"-signs
